description:
Taiki is relieved of his duty to find a king among the first group of people who came climbing the mountain.  He goes Sugu hunting with Gyoso and Risai.  Risai gets trapped and Gyoso gets hurt by a giant monster, Totetsu.  Taiki faces the monster and successfully defeats it to be his Shirei.(servant)  When Gyoso leaves the mountain, Taiki misses him so much that he finally transforms into a Kirin, chooses him to be a king and swears his loyalty.  But he didn’t receive the Heaven’s mission...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Umi, Meikyuu no Kishi - Go Shou
The Sea of Wind, The Shore of The Maze - Chapter 5
風の海 迷宮の岸 五章
